name: wrap.js
description: Returns a function that wraps input values such that [0 <= x < size].

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish
